Great place for all your cue sports needs. Bagged a new tip and chalk at a great price. More importantly exceptional service from Marvin who is very knowledgeable and offered great advice. Thanks to all at Wiraka for being awesome!

I bought a cue today. An excellent shop. The gentlemen there is so very very helpful with a wealth of knowledge. He is very friendly and his experience outstanding. A great place to buy a cue. Highly recommend. 2 full size snooker tables to try as well.

I went to this store to change my cue tip as recommended by my friend. The gentlemen is very friendly and he shared tips and knowledge with me.  I think his name is marvin. It was my first time to this store and I have good impression.
staff is very kind and helpful. willing to explain and go out of their way to help and provide exactly what you want and require.
